name: EqualWOrk
description:
Orc must be equal, Orc don't work more then he should
Controls
Y- give Orks pills
start- starts the round 
arrows - Movement

Mobile:
tap elevator - change floor
tap orc - you give him pills 

Points
Green bar : 0
Yellow bar : 1
Red bar : 3
Finished Day :10
Points are multiply by day number
